data.title: Jennifer Truckenbrod on LinkedIn: #anxiety #anger #depression #fear #drjen #hypnosis #change #learn #grow…
data.meta_description: Hypnosis is actually not a Mystic Art, Scientology or Psychic Ability. There is a lot of misconceptions out there, and that’s ok. If you have not been formally…
data.text:
🔥Your purpose for mindfulness, your values, and your goals are all things everyone needs to understand about themselves to be successful. 🔥Rarely do people just fall into success. Success is driven in goals, a purpose driven life, and understanding your core values. 🔥Take the time to learn about yourself, grow yourself, and know whats most important to you. 🔥Everyone loves success, but so many of us break down mid goal by the rigorous process and give Up. 🔥This is your sign to stop looking for Insta results and reset your mindset. #goals #mindset #journal #fyp #drjen #insta #personalgrowth #journey

Interested in learning more about hypnotherapy ? Hypnosis has been used for decades with actors, athletes and professionals looking to get to the next level. 🙌🔥🙌🔥 Hypnosis is for confidence building, mindset, fears and phobias, depression, anxiety and more…. My introduction to hypnosis video, audio and E-book package comes with all you need to learn about hypnosis, and comes with a money forward guarantee. 🔥🔥🔥🔥 https://lnkd.in/g29i8WNJ Ready for a full session ? A 90-120 min session with custom audio, and coaching follow up calls, is discounted through the end of March. Don’t wait for April fools and miss out. 🔥🔥🔥 Price is cut for a March for Mental health. ❤️🩹 https://lnkd.in/gH8yygrP Looking for more information? Comment here or PM me for more information. #mentalhealth #hypnosis #drjen #mindset #mindsetcoach #inspiration #motivation

“We operate 95-99% of our lives from our subconscious programs.” 🧠 🤯- Dr Bruce Lipton, Stanford University Medical Center. 💥The subconscious mind is molded by memories (attached to our mind by emotions experienced) that bring issues such as anxiety, fear, phobias, habits, and depression into the conscious forefront of our lives. 😧 💥The subconscious mind can be molded at anytime using mediative techniques like hypnotherapy, or repetitive conscious/subconscious reprogramming. 😵💫 😆 💥Rapid Transformational Therapy is a hybrid model of hypnosis with Cognitive Behavior Therapy, that has won awards in the UK for its success in weight loss, phobias, anxiety and much more. It’s been used by professional athletes, performers and actors for decades. Ready to reinvent yourself ? Some people who use hypnotherapy: 👇🙌 ⭐️Kate Middleton : for childbirth ⭐️Sylvester Stallone : during rocky movie in 1975 ⭐️Martha Stewart : for recurring nightmares ⭐️Julia Roberts : fixed her stutter ⭐️Orlando Bloom : sugar addiction And tons of professional athletes including olympians. 🏃♀️ 🏈🏀⚽️🎾🏓🏒🏏🥎🥊⛸️ Hypnotherapy helps with phobias, fears, anxiety, depression, habits, weight loss, athletic performance, stage fright…… the list is infinite. If your interested in learning more, giving the gift of mental health, or investing in changing your life!… PM me for more details about this weekends specials 🔥🔥🔥 I’m all about helping someone change their life this time of year!!! 🙌 Investing in you is ALWAYS the best gift anyone can give themselves this stressful season. 🤗

The mountains are calling. The sun, the rain, the Mountain Views, the sound of the wind and water. 🏔🌦 Mindfulness 🧘♂️ 🙌 Nothing like a vacation after a few tumultuous years. Learning new concepts, new ideas and sparking my inner energy. 📚 🔥 No matter how many times you have fallen, how many times you have been taken from and used ... you can keep moving forward. Even the tiniest step forward is progress. ☀️ Baby steps.... are still steps. Baby steps to the car ... baby steps to work ... baby steps to getting back up again and again. 🙌 Are you taking steps ? #whataboutBob #babysteps #energy #mindfulness #moutains #nature

🪵 Preschool Perspective. 🏫 🙌 ❤️ 🌳 Took a nature walk with 2 three-year-olds, and we came across a tree in our path. 🪵 —>Both girls said we have to turn around and go back the way we came. Their comments made me laugh, smile and pause a moment to take in the situation from their perspective. 👧🏼🧒🏼 I explained to them if they held my hand they could easily put one foot on top of the tree, step up and jump right over. And with a hand and some reassurance they happily continued on our walk, to only ask to go around again and again. 🪵 🌳 The smallest change in perspective completely changed their path. Makes you think ... what have you been looking at like a huge hurdle ? With a little help ... looking at the problem from another direction ... could you jump right over ? 💥 🙌 #think #entrepreneurmindset #mindfulness

Brief synopsis of my recent trip to Utah. ✈️ ⛰Saw beautiful mountains that mesmorized. Got to get out of my mom gear for a few days to socialize and meet new up and coming entrepreneurs.👩💻👨💼 🧬🔬Totally geeked out meeting scientists that are revolutionizing healthcare. Pic three ... well that’s the aftermath from chatting with the most brilliant minds I’ve ever met. 🤯🙌 . #healthcare #entrepreneurs #nerdlife #healingjourney #starttoday

I lost my brain in Utah. 🧠 + 📚+🏔= ♥️ 🤷♀️ It was bogged down with clutter, dim lighting, and too many lattes and so the loss wasn’t tragic. I’d long become a zombie that I didn’t want to associate with. 🧟 It took several days to dump the trash talk from my inner dialogue and find the sun despite how incredibly gorgeous the mountains of Utah glow in the sunlight. ☀️⛰ Shocking what we discover when we stop looking and just be still. 🙌 I met new people. 🙍🏾♀️🙍🙍🏼♂️🙍🏽 Learned new things. 📚 Found that spark that had been buried too deep for too long. ⚡️ And the next chapter has been started. 💥💥💥💥💥W A R N I N G 💥💥💥💥 💥 It’s going to be a real page turner 😉 #freshstart #learning #newbeginnings #utah #mindset #healthcare #brainhealth
